body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Biography","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With a repertoire of over 500 songs featuring the best 50s and 60's Rock 'n' Roll, 70s, 80s and modern pop classics, the band are suitable for just about any occasion including corporate events, weddings, parties and outdoor festivals.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Kicks are a professional team of musicians with years of experience working in the music industry. Between them they've worked with famous names such as Robbie Williams, Jools Holland and Westlife performing at some of the largest venues in the UK. With a client list that includes Barclays Bank, Sky, BP and the BBC but to name a few, you can be 100% certain that these guys are as professional as it gets.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Add a horn section for the ultimate stage show!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The band offer a number of line-ups to suit every budget, from the core trio right up to an 8-piece featuring female vocals and horn section (Trombone, Trumpet & Saxophone). The most popular being the 4-piece offering guitar, bass, keys/sax, drums and 4 lead vocals. Just drop us an email for more details on the various line-ups and prices in your area.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Optional DJ, Jazz sets or Bandeoke sets","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With their vast repertoire, the band make sure that every set list is varied on the night, based upon their audience and client preferences. As well as this, they also offer additional Jazz sets during dinner and drinks reception to save you booking more than one band.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The band include professionally mixed music throughout the breaks or alternatively offer a professional DJ to work alongside the band for a night that runs seamlessly from start to finish. If you're looking for a bit of audience interaction, why not enquire about some Bandeoke - karaoke with a live band!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Kicks are the ideal band for a fun, entertaining and highly professional evening of entertainment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pageContext.title: The Kicks
pageContext.description: Rock band that brings fun, energy and a killer repertoire to every event.

body.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Biography","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lera is aÂ ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.bandsforhire.net/harpists-for-hire"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"professional Harpist","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"
 who studied the instrument at the age of 8 and mastered it after 
attending Gnessin State Musical College and later Moscow Conservatoire 
College. She is incredibly experienced having played at numerous events 
and venues such as: The Conservatory's Concert Halls, Rachmaninov's 
Concert Hall, The National Gallery, Royal Albert Hall, The Forge, The 
Houses Of Parliament and The Royal College of Music. Notable members of 
the audience also include HRH the Prince of Wales amongst an array of 
other famous faces.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"With a repertoire that includes all styles of 
music from classical, jazz and blues to pop, Bollywood and much more, 
Lera's diversity lends itself to just about any formal occasion. Lera is
 the perfect accompaniment to your wedding breakfast, private dinner 
party, corproate function and more.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lera also offers alternative 
line ups to include the accompaniment of a flute, viola, violin and 
cello. If this is something you're interested in please let us know on 
your enquiry.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"

","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
